meanings.definition: Having a stronger smell or taste of garlic.
meanings.sent1: The garlickier pasta made my breath smell like garlic for hours.
meanings.sent2: The garlickier sauce added a delicious flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally used the garlickier seasoning and now everything tastes like garlic!
meanings.sent4: The garlickier aroma filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.
meanings.sent5: The garlickier garlic bread was so pungent, it could be smelled from across the room.

meanings.sent1: This dish is garlickier than the one we had last week.
meanings.sent2: The garlickier option is definitely more flavorful.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd enjoy something garlickier than this!
meanings.sent4: The garlickier sauce was a game-changer for the recipe.
meanings.sent5: The garlickier pizza had me craving more with each bite.
